DOC.brief_summary: The aim study perform randomize control trial evaluate usefulness preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) patient repetitive implantation failure . Patients prospectively randomize two group : standard IVF blastocyst transfer day-5 transfer day-5 PGD aneuploidy screen chromosome 13 , 15 , 16 , 18 , 21 , 22 , X Y . The end point study : Cancellation rate ; implantation rate ongoing implantation rate . Inclusion criterion : patient ≥2 previous IVF failure without clinical biochemical pregnancy transfer least 2 good quality embryos per transfer . Exclusion criterion uterine abnormality , abnormal karyotype , abnormal result thrombophilia screen low responder patient ( less 4 expect oocyte ) .
